|1effect=Enables【Canto (Dist. +1; Max ４)】.<br><br>When Canto triggers, enables unit to use 【Reposition】on ally (this effect is not treated as an Assist skill; if similar effects are active, this effect does not trigger).<br><br>At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+6,【Null Follow-Up】, and 【Incited】to unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn and grants "unit can move 1 extra space" to unit and sword, lance, axe, infantry, and flying allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn (does not stack).<br><br>If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat + 5 (max 9) and reduces damage from foe's first attack by 7 during combat ("first attack" normally means only the first strike; for effects that grant "unit attacks twice," it means the first and second strikes), and restores 7 HP to unit after combat.<br><br>【Canto (Dist. +1; Max ４)】<br>After an attack, Assist skill, or structure destruction, unit can move spaces = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit before the above, +1. (Max ４.)<br><br>【Reposition】<br>Range = 1. Target moves to opposite side of unit.<br><br>【Null Follow-Up】<br>If unit's Spd > foe's Spd during combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks for 1 turn.<br><br>【Incited】<br>If unit initiates combat, grants bonus to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res = number of spaces from start position to end position of unit during combat (max 3; that turn only).
|1cost=300
|1required=-
}}
